/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and pedestrians add a dynamic element to the scene, reflecting the city's vibrant energy. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape.
